backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, and file/folder metadata with authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs for two recent enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with short descriptions of each component’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/docs/smoke-test-open.md: Manual smoke‑test checklist verifying file open behavior across views, menus, blockers, and error cases.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app with the VaultLeaf Drive title.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing VaultLeaf Drive features, prerequisites, and setup instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling authentication, actor initialization, profile setup flow, and rendering the file manager.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Unauthenticated landing screen with marketing content and Internet Identity login handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to create a username, submitting via sign‑up mutation with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/drive/Breadcrumb: Renders navigable breadcrumb trail for current folder using folder hierarchy and triggers navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/drive/ConfirmDel: Modal dialog asking user to confirm deletion of a file or folder with optional progress state.
frontend/src/components/drive/CreateFold: Dialog for creating a new folder, handling name input, mutation, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/drive/ExportFold: Button or menu item that exports a folder as a ZIP file and shows a progress dialog during export.
frontend/src/components/drive/FileAction: Provides file-level actions like open, download, rename, move, and delete through a dropdown menu and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/drive/FileManage: Main drive browser managing folder navigation, search, sorting, views, uploads, and selection state.
frontend/src/components/drive/FileUpload: Handles multi-file upload with progress tracking, error handling, and status display inside a dialog.
frontend/src/components/drive/FolderActi: Dropdown menu for folder actions including export, rename, and delete, with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/drive/ItemContex: Provides a context menu for file and folder actions including open, download, move, rename, and delete with supporting dialogs.
frontend/src/components/drive/ItemGrid.t: Renders files and folders in a responsive grid with selection, context menus, and basic metadata display.
frontend/src/components/drive/ItemList.t: Displays files and folders in a table layout with selection, context menus, and metadata like size and modified date.
frontend/src/components/drive/MoveItemDi: Dialog for selecting a destination folder and moving a file using moveFile mutation.
frontend/src/components/drive/RenameDial: Dialog for renaming files or folders using rename mutations with validation and feedback.
A simple search input with icon for filtering files and folders.
frontend/src/components/drive/SelectionT: Toolbar for bulk actions on selected items, mainly delete with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/drive/SortContro: Controls for selecting sort field and direction via dropdown and toggle button.
frontend/src/components/drive/ViewToggle: Provides list/grid view toggle buttons for the file manager.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ActorIn: Displays a warning banner for recoverable actor init issues with a retry button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Connect: Shows a loading screen while establishing a drive connection.
frontend/src/components/feedback/DriveBr: Renders an error state for drive loading failures with retry and sign‐out options.
frontend/src/components/feedback/EmptySt: Displays an empty state message for an empty drive or folder.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Shows skeleton placeholders while loading file or folder data.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopBar.ts: Implements the top navigation bar with theme switcher, user info, and login/logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDriveActor.ts: Wraps useActor with initialization state handling and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, folders, and files using the drive actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Provides functions to normalize backend errors into user-friendly messages and detect auth or connection-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpen.ts: Determines MIME types, checks browser-viewability, and opens or downloads files with fallbacks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/utils/folderExport.ts: Recursively collects folder contents and generates a simple ZIP-like blob for download with optional progress reporting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, issues, and high-level goals for building a Drive-like web app.
